T12D4304:378a-22: de rnams kyi mtha' ste brgyad nyis 'gyur du bya'o //
T12D4304:378a-23: yang na yang ba'i bya ba ste /
T12D4304:378a-24: gcig dang bzhi dang drug dang bzhi dang gcig rnams te /
T12D4304:378a-26: de lta bus britta bcu drug tu 'gyur ro //
T12D4304:378a-28: grangs nyid warnna sa bsgyur de nas //
T12D4304:378a-29: de phyed de nas gnyis ka'ang bsdam //
T12D4304:378a-30: dang por yi ge dbus lci yang //
T12D4304:378a-31: de rjes phyi mo rnams yin no //
T12D4304:378a-32: 'dir warnna'i sgras gsal byed rnams su ma nges pa'i dbyangs yig brjod do //
T12D4304:378a-33: britta rnams kyi yi ge la sogs pa shes par 'dod pa la cho ga 'di'o //
T12D4304:378a-34: dper na yi ge bzhi pa'i sdeb sbyor la britta'i
T12D4304:378a-35: grangs bcu drug ces pa 'di nyid dang por bris
T12D4304:378a-36: te // yi ge bzhi rnams kyis bsgyur bar bya'o //
T12D4304:378a-37: de nas phyis de'i phyed dang /
T12D4304:378a-38: de nas kyang phyis de gnyis ka bsdam mo //
T12D4304:378a-42: de la dang po ni yi ge rnams te drug bcu rtsa bzhi'o //
T12D4304:378a-43: dbus ma ni lci ba yang yin zhing yang ba yang yin te /
T12D4304:378a-45: tha ma ni phyi mo rnams te dgu bcu rtsa drug go //
T12D4304:378a-46: yi ge dang lci yang dang phyi mo'i grangs so //
T12D4304:378a-47: yi ge britta gnyis kyis bsgyur /
T12D4304:378a-48: gcig dman aa dhva 'phreng dang 'og / lci yang rnams kyis dang ni //
T12D4304:378a-49: de la bar yang mchungs pa'o //
T12D4304:378a-50: sdeb sbyor 'di la pr'ast'a ra ji tsam gyi aa
T12D4304:378a-51: dhva 'phred dang 'og tu ji tsam 'gro zhes pa
T12D4304:378a-52: shes par 'dod pa la cho ga 'di'o //
T12D4304:378a-53: dper na yi ge bzhi pa la /
T12D4304:378a-54: yi ge bzhi po de rnams gnyis kyis bsgyur ba la gcig dman pa na bdun du 'gyur ro //
T12D4304:378b-0: de'i phyir nas @378b sam sor la sogs pa bdun 'phred kyi aa dhva'o //
T12D4304:378b-1: britta bcu drug po de rnams gnyis kyis bsgyur ba
T12D4304:378b-2: la gcig dman pa rnams sum cu so gcig tu
T12D4304:378b-3: 'gyur ro // de'i phyir nas sam sor la sogs pa sum cu so gcig 'og gi aa dhva'o //
T12D4304:378b-4: de ltar ni lci ba rnams kyis ji snyed pa
T12D4304:378b-5: de snyed du yang ba rnams kyis brtag par bya'o
T12D4304:378b-6: // ri mo rnams kyi ji snyed pa de snyed nyid du de'i bar rnams kyi'o //
T12D4304:378b-8: yang ba'i bya ba grangs dang aa dhva ste /
T12D4304:378b-9: de ltar drug po de rnams rim pa bzhin //
T12D4304:378b-10: britta rnams la rtogs byed rnams yin no //
T12D4304:378b-11: pr'ast'a ra la sogs pa drug mnyam pa'i britta rnams la rtogs byed yin te /
T12D4304:378b-12: phyed mnyam pa la ma yin zhing /
T12D4304:378b-13: mi mnyam pa la ma yin la /
T12D4304:378b-14: dz'a ti rnams la'ang mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T12D4304:378b-15: ji ltar de rnams rtogs byed yin zhe na /
T12D4304:378b-16: 'di rnams kyi gang las ma rtogs pa'i khyad par nyung dus rtogs par byed cing /
T12D4304:378b-17: bstan bcos mdzad pa rnams kyi yang mkhyen pa phul
T12D4304:378b-18: du byung ba yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur te
T12D4304:378b-19: / sgra gcan spyod pa la sogs pa brtsis pas skar rtsis pa la bzhin no //
T12D4304:378b-20: mnyam pa'i britta rnams kyi pr'ast'a ra mtha' dag la rtogs byed drug rnams bshad zin to //
T12D4304:378b-25: yi ge dang phyi mo rnams kyi grangs shes pa brjod par bya'o //
T12D4304:378b-26: de la dper brjod pa ni tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po 'di dag go //
T12D4304:378b-27: gang zhig mchog dang gang zhig dam pa'i don //
T12D4304:378b-28: ma lus don dam lam 'bras rtogs gyur cing //
T12D4304:378b-29: skye bo gang yang der ni bskyed mdzad pa //
T12D4304:378b-30: sangs rgyas chos tshogs de rnams rgyal gyur cing //
T12D4304:378b-31: ya: pa ra ma: pa ra m'artho ya da khi la pa ra m'artha ga ti pha lam bartme /
T12D4304:378b-32: tadzdza ni to yashtsa dza no dza yanti te buddha dharmma ga na:/
T12D4304:378b-33: rgyal chos nad las rgyal ba rgyal gyur cig / de yi lhan cig spyod ma shes rab kyang //
T12D4304:378b-34: gnyis la lhag mos sa bon las byung ba //
T12D4304:378b-35: lus can 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams rgyal gyur cig /
T12D4304:378b-36: dza ya ti dzi no dharmm'a mo dza ya ti
T12D4304:378b-37: phradzny'a tsa sa ha tsa r'i ta sya /
T12D4304:378b-38: au pa y'a di mukti n'i dza pra sa wa ta n'u dza ya ti ts'arya ga na:/
T12D4304:378b-39: 'dir phyi mo rnams lnga bcu rtsa bdun no //
T12D4304:378b-41: lci ba rnams bcu bdun no//
T12D4304:378b-42: yang ba rnams nyi shu rtsa gsum mo //
T12D4304:378b-43: grangs gnyis gnyis dag bstan nas /
T12D4304:378b-44: ji ltar rigs par cig shos rnams gsal bar bya
T12D4304:378b-45: ba yin pas de dang de rnams ni 'og dang
T12D4304:378b-46: steng du bkod pa'i las kyi mtha' la blta bar
T12D4304:378b-47: bya'o // yang ba rnams kyi yi ge dor //
T12D4304:378b-48: phyi mo yang ba dor 'dab ma'ang //
T12D4304:378b-49: yi ge dor ba'i phyi mo yang //
T12D4304:379a-2: yi ge 40 phi mo 57 phyi mo 57 lci ba ji tsam yod ces 'dri na /
T12D4304:379a-3: dang po dang mtha' la dbri'o //
T12D4304:379a-5: de lta bus lci ba bcu bdun rnams su 'gyur ro //
T12D4304:379a-7: lci ba nyis 'gyur gyis phyi mo //
T12D4304:379a-8: yi ge nyis 'gyur phyi mos spangs //
T12D4304:379a-9: lci ba bral ba'i yi ge rnams //
T12D4304:379a-10: de rnams ji snyed 'dir yang ba //
T12D4304:379a-11: phyi mo 57 yi ge 40 yi ge 40 dang
T12D4304:379a-12: po la lci ba rnams nyis 'gyur du byas te
T12D4304:379a-13: dbri'o // dbus su yi ge rnams nyis 'gyur du byas te phyi mos dbri'o //
T12D4304:379a-15: de lta bus yang ba nyi shu rtsa bdun du 'gyur ro //
T12D4304:379a-17: lci yang bsdoms pa ji snyed de //
T12D4304:379a-18: phyi mo lci bral ji snyed do //
T12D4304:379a-21: de snyed 'dir ni yi ge rnams /
T12D4304:379a-22: lci ba 17 phyi mo 57 phyi mo 57 dang po la bsnan no //
T12D4304:379a-25: de lta bus yi ge bzhi bcu rnams su 'gyur ro //
T12D4304:379a-27: lci ba nyis 'gyur yang ba bsre //
T12D4304:379a-28: yi ge nyis 'gyur yang rnams dor //
T12D4304:379a-29: lci ba bsres pa'i yi ge rnams //
T12D4304:379a-30: de rnams ji snyed 'dir phyi mo //
T12D4304:379a-31: yang ba 92 yi ge 40 yi ge 40 dang
T12D4304:379a-32: po la lci ba rnams gnyis 'gyur byas te bsnan
T12D4304:379a-33: no // dbus su yi ge rnams nyis 'gyur byas te yang ba rnams dbri'o //
T12D4304:379a-35: de lta bus phyi mo lnga bcu rtsa bdun 'gyur ro //
T12D4304:379a-37: rgyal ba'i rig pa 'di la bdag dad pa'i //
T12D4304:379a-38: bsod nams gang zhig bdag la rab skyes pa ;
T12D4304:379a-39: / de yis 'gro rnams dam pa'i don dang ni //
T12D4304:379a-40: rig pa mchog la rab tu dad gyur cig /
T12D4304:379a-41: rtsod pa'i dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa rin chen
T12D4304:379a-42: 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i sdeb sbyor
T12D4304:379a-43: rin chen 'byung nas zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T12D4304:379a-45: // /'di ni chos ldan ra za ba dang /
T12D4304:379a-46: yar klungs ba grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o //
T12D4304:379a-47: slad kyi sa gsum na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i
T12D4304:379a-48: thams cad mkhyen pa chen po don gyi slad du
T12D4304:379a-50: byang chub rtse mo'i zhal snga nas bsgyur ba la /
T12D4304:379a-51: slar yang de nyid kyi bkas rjes su gnang ba la brten te /
T12D4304:379a-53: skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin gyis legs par bskyangs pa'i dge slong nam mkha' bzang pos /
T12D4304:379a-54: sh'akya'i dge slong sdom brtson dam pa rnams kyi gtsug rgyan /
T12D4304:379a-55: sde snod gsum gyi glegs bam gcig pu /
T12D4304:379a-56: skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang po dpal ldan blo gros
T12D4304:379a-57: brtan pa'i phyag bris kyi rgya dpe la gtugs nas
